name: LD42 Working Title
description:
Description

You are trying to escape from the Norvolan Pirates on your way to your next delivery. Try to make the jump to light speed and escape the Pirates to win the game.

Controls

Use the mouse button to select game pieces. Select two pieces next to each other to swap them.

  • Warp - if you reach 100 your warp engines will engage and you win
  • Speed - if it reaches zero, you will be caught
  • Shields - if it reaches zero you hull will take damage
  • Weapons - not implemented yet
  • Power - not implemented yet
  • Hull - if it reaches zero, your game is over

Known Issues

  • sometimes incorrect matches occur (to your benefit)
  • sometimes crashes on replay (refresh the page)

Release History

2018-08-13 - ludum dare release
